triples.name: MapReduce
triples.relevance: A distributed computing framework essential for parallelizing algorithms on massive datasets.

triples.name: Locality-sensitive hashing
triples.relevance: A fuzzy hashing technique explained in the book for efficient similarity search and clustering.

triples.name: Stream processing
triples.relevance: Algorithms for processing data streams that arrive faster than exhaustive processing can handle.

triples.name: PageRank
triples.relevance: An algorithm for ranking web pages used to organize web search results discussed in the book.

triples.name: Frequent pattern discovery
triples.relevance: The problem of finding frequent itemsets in large datasets, a core data mining task covered in the book.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: A fundamental data mining task for grouping similar data points discussed extensively in the book.

triples.name: Decision tree
triples.relevance: A machine learning method with new and extended coverage in the third edition of the book.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Modern neural network-based methods with new coverage added in the latest edition of the book.

triples.name: Social graph
triples.relevance: Network structures representing social relationships, the focus of new chapters on mining social networks.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: The core discipline that encompasses the entire focus of the book on extracting patterns from large datasets.
